author: Source: Canada.com
title: Postmedia shuts down its evening tablet edition to focus on news app - Canada.com
text:
Postmedia is scrapping the short-lived evening tablet edition it hoped would help usher in the next wave of digital journalism. A spokeswoman for the media company confirmed that Wednesday evening would see the final editions of the digital experiment at the Calgary Herald, Ottawa Citizen and Montreal Gazette.
 Canada.com.
